dataquery.name: WorkingQueue
dataquery.sql: SELECT BOOKTYPE AS 'HistBookType' ,BOOK AS 'Book' ,PAGE AS 'Page' ,IMAGE AS 'Image' ,PATH AS 'Path' ,SERVER AS 'Server' ,ID ,PPG FROM bpimageindex Where (book + ' ' + PAGE)<>'1160 1767'
